summary: This script clears the contents of the 'ramdisk' directory, ensuring a clean slate for subsequent operations. It uses 'sudo rm -f' to remove files and 'find -P | xargs sudo unlink' to recursively delete all directories within 'ramdisk'.

details.comment: This script clears the contents of the 'ramdisk' directory, ensuring a clean slate for subsequent operations. It uses 'sudo rm -f' to remove files and 'find -P | xargs sudo unlink' to recursively delete all directories within 'ramdisk'.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
sudo rm -f ramdisk/*
sudo find -P ramdisk/ | xargs sudo unlink
sudo rm -rf ramdisk/*
